div.p: No 24, p. 307, unit 1, VPRS 5887 Secretary's outward letter books p. 307, VA 912 Trustees of the Public Library, Museum and National Gallery of Victoria, Public Record Office, Victoria.

I have the honor to inform you that the Trustees have re-considered your offer of the collection of German Scientific Works of Herr Fischer, and I am instructed to inform you that they are prepared to accept the collection as per list for the sum of One hundred and twenty five pounds.
MS annotation: '£125'. See H. Sheffield to M, 6 April 1881 (in this edition as 81-04-06a), and the notes thereto. It would appear that M himself paid for both the Rothschild and Fischer collections and was subsequently reimbursed by the Library, since at a meeting of the Library Committee on 28 June his account for £175 was passed for payment; see State Library of Victoria, Trustees of the Public Library, Gallery and Museum, Minutes, vol. 13a (MSF12855).
